summary: This document is a Convertible Promissory Note issued by ConnectM Technology Solutions, Inc., promising to pay $150,000 plus 20% annual interest, due 180 days from issuance unless converted or prepaid. The note can be converted into common stock at a price of $1.10 per share within 90 days of issuance. The securities are unregistered and subject to transfer restrictions under U.S. securities laws.
